attributes.action: Reduce University fees due to the Corona virus pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The SLC which is part of the UK Governments Department for Education  provides the student loans, therefore they are the ones who can oversee & implement a change of decision.
attributes.background: Reduce the University course fees / amount of money that students attending university during the pandemic are expected to pay back. Students aren’t receiving the same standard of education or support as students from previous years, so its unfair they’re expected to pay the same amount.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814
